title: Unstoppable Mathieu van der Poel Powers to Record-Equaling 7th World Cyclocross Championship Title
content:
Van der Poel dominates to match legendary Erik de Vlaeminck, Wout van Aert a distant second after low grid position and a fall.

Read the full article at Unstoppable Mathieu van der Poel Powers to Record-Equaling 7th World Cyclocross Championship Title on Velo.
author: sstokes
